TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 700
TEI.2.document_title: George Duty to Stephen F Austin, 11-09-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: George Duty to Austin, November 9, 1831. Bill for hauling brick for house of Anthony Butler,
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 700

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*George Duty to Austin, November 9, 1831. Bill for hauling brick for house of Anthony Butler, */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*Matthew Duty*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*To hawling brick for house of *person_mentioned*Col Anthony Butler*/person_mentioned* at $4 per day 5 and 3 fourth days—makes Dr $23.00*/p*
*p*The above is the contract I made with*person_mentioned* Mr Duty*/person_mentioned* as to the price and the number of days he proves by*person_mentioned* Mr Cravens*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Russell Holt*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*L Lesassier*/person_mentioned* acting for *person_mentioned*Col. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-09-1831">Novemr 9 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Reed Payt from *person_mentioned*S M Williams*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*George Duty*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
